title: Cap, 18th century
medium:
Medium: white satin, gold thread, paillettes, gold lace (bobbin)
Technique: embroidery
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White satin bonnet with embroidery in gold thread and paillettes in design of flowers with leaves; gold lace around face opening. Ties of (faded) pink silk ribbon.

Cap, 18th century.
